channel.title: mini slimline on Nancy's Creative Mess
channel.description: Recent content in mini slimline on Nancy's Creative Mess

item.title: *Time Out Challenges #220*
item.description: I’m back as part of the design team at Time Out Challenges with a new challenge to get your creative juices flowing! This is one of two non-clean and simple blogs that I design for so let your creativity flow as much as you want with these challenges! For the next two weeks, we want to see you create your own backgrounds! We have an awesome prize from Stamplorations available to be won as well!

item.title: *April 2022 Sheetload*
item.description: Before I broke my wrist, I played along with the April 2022 Sheetload of Cards… The way it worked out trying to make one card, it made more sense to make two since what I cut off was exactly what I needed for the second piece. These two cards are the same, but different I really do love the size of a mini slimline! Card Info *Cardstock: Stampin’ Up! Cherry Cobbler, Lucky Limeade
